title: Build a Cat Photo App
description: Create a simple, accessible Cat Photo App that showcases images, lists, and a submission form using semantic HTML and a touch of CSS.

steps.title: Create the project folder and index.html
Add the HTML5 doctype
Open the <html> tag with a lang attribute
Add a <head> with meta charset and viewport
Set the page <title>
Link a stylesheet (style.css)
Add the <body> element
Insert a semantic <header> with the site name
Build a <nav> with in-page links
Add the <main> landmark
Create a hero section with an <h1>
Insert a hero cat image with descriptive alt text
Wrap the hero image in <figure> and add a <figcaption>
Add a “Cat Photos” section with an <h2>
Create a gallery list of cat thumbnails
Link each thumbnail to a full-size image
Add a “Cat Lists” section with an <h2>
List things cats love using an unordered list
Add an ordered list of top cat facts
Emphasize key words with <em> and <strong>
Add a cat quote using <blockquote> and cite
Create a “Cat Form” section with an <h2>
Add a <form> element with an action attribute
Group options in a <fieldset> for Indoor/Outdoor
Add two radio inputs sharing a name with labels
Add a <fieldset> for Personality checkboxes
Add three checkbox inputs with labels
Add a text input for photo URL with placeholder and required
Add a submit button
Associate labels and inputs using for/id
Give sections ids to anchor the nav links
Add a skip-to-main accessible link
Insert a semantic <footer> with copyright text
Mark external links with target="_blank" and rel="noopener"
Create style.css
Set base fonts, colors, and spacing
Style the header and navigation layout
Make gallery images responsive
Tidy list spacing and bullets
Style form controls and the submit button
Add a responsive layout with max-width and a media query
Validate HTML and polish copy

requirements.title: Headings
requirements.description: Add at least one <h1> and one <h2> element.

requirements.title: Paragraph
requirements.description:
Include at least one

element with text content.

requirements.title: Image
requirements.description: Add an element with a src attribute and alt text.

requirements.title: Link
requirements.description: Add an <a> element with an href attribute.

requirements.title: List
requirements.description: Include at least one <ul> or <ol> with <li> items inside.
